description: [Status: stable] [Name: deprecated-c-element-tree] [Message: cElementTree is deprecated, use ElementTree] What it does Checks for uses of the xml.etree.cElementTree module. Why is this bad? In Python 3.3, xml.etree.cElementTree was deprecated in favor of xml.etree.ElementTree. Example from xml.etree import cElementTree as ET Use instead: from xml.etree import ElementTree as ET
